name: Nexus
description: AI gateway that aggregates multiple MCP servers and LLM providers through a unified HTTP interface with JWT...

capabilities: **Docker Ready**: Available as a container image with minimal configuration needed
**LLM Provider Routing**: Unified interface for OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and AWS Bedrock LLM providers with full tool calling support
**MCP Server Aggregation**: Connect multiple MCP servers (STDIO, SSE, HTTP) through a single endpoint
**Rate Limiting**: Multi-level rate limiting with in-memory or Redis backends
**Flexible Configuration**: TOML-based configuration with environment variable substitution
**Context-Aware Tool Search**: Intelligent fuzzy search across all connected tools using natural language queries
**Protocol Support**: Supports STDIO (subprocess), SSE (Server-Sent Events), and streamable HTTP MCP servers
**Security**: Built-in CORS, CSRF protection, OAuth2, and TLS support
metadata.readme_excerpt:
Plug in all your MCP servers, APIs, and LLM providers. Route everything through a unified endpoint.
Aggregate, govern, and control your AI stack.

## Features - **MCP Server Aggregation**: Connect multiple MCP servers (STDIO, SSE, HTTP) through a single endpoint - **LLM Provider Routing**: Unified interface for OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and AWS Bedrock LLM providers with full tool calling support - **Context-Aware Tool Search**: Intelligent fuzzy search across all connected tools using natural language queries - **Protocol Support**: Supports STDIO (subprocess), SSE (Server-Sent Events), and streamable HTTP MCP servers - **Flexible Configuration**: TOML-based configuration with environment variable substitution - **Security**: Built-in CORS, CSRF protection, OAuth2, and TLS support - **Rate Limiting**: Multi-level rate limiting with in-memory or Redis backends - **Docker Ready**: Available as a container image with minimal configuration needed ## Installation
